mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId , QNA_NUM as qnaNum , TITLE as title , CONTENTS as contents , STATUS as status , REG_DT as regDt , ORG_FILE_NM as orgFileNm , SAVE_FILE_NM as saveFileNm , EXT as ext , FILE_SIZE as fileSize , RE_CONTENTS as reContents , RE_DT as reDt FROM qna WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY USER_ID ASC

SELECT USER_ID as userId , QNA_NUM as qnaNum , TITLE as title , CONTENTS as contents , STATUS as status , REG_DT as regDt , ORG_FILE_NM as orgFileNm , SAVE_FILE_NM as saveFileNm , EXT as ext , FILE_SIZE as fileSize , RE_CONTENTS as reContents , RE_DT as reDt FROM qna WHERE QNA_NUM = #{qnaNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT b.code_id as codeId , b.code_nm as codeNm , b.num FROM code_type a JOIN code b ON a.code_type_id = b.code_type_id WHERE a.code_type_id = #{codeTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.use_yn = 1 ORDER BY b.num
